analysis.key_quote: I am strongly opposed to the proposed rule on 'Performance, Accountability and Responsiveness in the Civil Service,' which, I believe, will undermine important traditions of professionalism and expertise in the administration of government policy.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule, citing concerns about undermining professionalism and expertise, which aligns with themes of merit-based systems and politicization. The acknowledgment of the need for reforms, but rejection of the proposed rule as too extreme, further emphasizes the opposition.
